DOC.brief_title: Helping Mothers Select Better Childbirth Hospitals
DOC.detailed_description: The choice childbirth provider one consequential decision pregnant woman make . The hospital delivers well predictor many treatment decision risk preference . For example , choose wrong hospital increase risk cesarean delivery 10-fold . Cumulatively , avoidable cesarean delivery estimate cause 20,000 major surgical complication , $ 5 billion spending , unmeasured pain year United States . The propose project aim prevent harm empower woman choose hospital risk-appropriate cesarean delivery rate . Preliminary research indicate majority woman may understand hospital-level quality data applies personally . In test sample 1,000 demographically diverse pregnant mother , half know hospital-level cesarean delivery rate important , overwhelming majority know obstetrical infection rate , maternal neonatal birth trauma rate , hospital quality metric important selecting hospital .
